articles.title: China says US is ‘playing with fire’ after latest military aid for Taiwan - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Chinese government is protesting the latest American announcements of military sales and assistance to Taiwan, warning the United States that it is “playing with fire.” A Chinese Foreign Ministry statement on Sunday urged the U.S. to stop arming Taiwan an…
articles.content:
BEIJING (AP) The Chinese government protested Sunday the latest American announcements of military sales and assistance to Taiwan, warning the United States that it is playing with fire.
